comments.raw_text:
When dragging to create a new event in the views, we immediately create the event in the target calendar. Its highly unlikely that users want to create an event called "New Event", so we should postpone the actual writing until the user blurs the textbox to enter the event name.

This might post difficulties if the calendar is refreshed, care should be taken that the event doesn't go away.
